title: Grateful Dead Live at Hartford Civic Center on 1983-10-15
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi CR-5A > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab 2496 > R8Brain SRC > Wavelab (adding 16-bit patches) > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC 1644 tagged. Transferred by Andrew F. 06/2016
source: AUD: Nakamichi CM300/CP4 shotguns > Sony TC-D5M > Maxell XLII for Set 1 and TDK MA-Metal for Set 2, FOB (approx tenth row) recording by Brian Schley.
